document_data.name: Barnibus Blastwind
document_data.mainbody: '''Barnibus Blastwind''' was a special investigator of the [[Watchful Order of Magists and Protectors]] in [[Waterdeep]] in the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Barnibus, like his friend, the retired [[City Watch (Waterdeep)|City Watch]] [[Generic City Guard sergeant (Waterdeep)|sergeant]] [[Saeth Cromley]], wanted solid evidence and testimonies before ordering arrests. He preferred to not have unauthorized people in the crime scene.
document_data.Activities:
Outside work, Barnibus lived in an estate in the [[Sea Ward of Waterdeep|Sea Ward]] that he inherited from his grandmother.

Barnibus was assigned to investigate all crimes involving [[magic]] in Waterdeep.

Sometimes, in difficult cases, he asked the help of his friend Saeth.
document_data.Relationships: Barnibus and Sergeant Cromley had a working partnership.
document_data.History:
In [[1492 DR]],{{WDH-time}} Barnibus was called to investigate the blast that killed ten people in [[North Ward of Waterdeep|North Ward]], including the [[gnome]] [[Dalakhar]]. He asked for the support of Saeth.

Later, Barnibus, with Saeth at his side, was called in to investigate the [[Gralhund Villa Bloodbath]].
